ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 179
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I am a Lvl 4 Human Shadowknight who worships Innorukk .. . My friend is an Agnostic Human Mage and he is not KOS from Dark Elf guards. . . I should be at
ygData.messageBody:
Hi I am a Lvl 4 Human Shadowknight who worships Innorukk .. .

My friend is an Agnostic Human Mage and he is not KOS from Dark Elf guards.
. .

I should be at least apprehensive since he is dubious was my thinking, but I
just wanted to know what any other human shadowknights experiences were. . .


I picked Human for 1 main reason, all my friends who I am playing my low lvl
Shadowkngiht with are good and I thought Human would be the most welcome in
other good cities . . .

How do you guys like playing a Shadowknight???

I have a L42 Ogre Shaman also and a L26 Necro Gnome . . .

:-)

Naztek the SK
E'ci
